saved.author: Emma Roth
saved.title: Sam Altman says ChatGPT will soon sext with verified adults
saved.description: OpenAI will soon allow “erotica” for ChatGPT users who verify their age on the platform. In an X post on Tuesday, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said the company will add support for mature conversations when it launches age-gating in December. “As we roll out age-gat…
